main event: A middle-aged accountant was digging in the garden of his home when he had an encounter with a saucer-like object that appeared to be a ball of fire. The object drifted towards the witness and emitted a pulsating blue light, causing a sense of terror and dread.
interesting points: The witness reported feeling a sense of terror when encountering the object.
The saucer-like object emitted a pulsating blue light and appeared to be hovering a few feet off the ground.
The witness encountered unusual beings resembling humans but with indistinct faces.
This incident led to teasing at school and a wish that it had never happened.
Sonny DesVergers had a hair-raising encounter with the UFO, which prompted the witness to wish the incident had never occurred.
sighted object: Saucer-like object emitting pulsating blue light
